document.full_text: the pace of growth in the u.s. services sector unexpectedly eased in april to its lowest level since august 2010, according to an industry report released on wednesday.
document.title: service sector growth slows in april: ism
lines_and_colors: the pace of growth in the u.s. services sector unexpectedly eased in april to its lowest level since august 2010, according to an industry report released on wednesday.
